title: ‘The Fight for the Win is Over:’ Vingegaard Accepts Tour de France Defeat, But Plots Revenge
content:
'Mentally this is not a blow:' This Tour de France was one weekend too long and two months too soon for Visma-Lease a Bike.

Read the full article at ‘The Fight for the Win is Over:’ Vingegaard Accepts Tour de France Defeat, But Plots Revenge on Velo.
author: ahood
